entry.title: æš´åŠ›é€’å½’
entry.content:
1. æ±‰è¯ºå¡”

public static void hannoi(int n){
  process(n, "from", "to", "help");
} 

public static void process(int n, String from, String to, String help){
  if(n == 1){
    System.out.println("move" + from + "to" + to);
  }else{
    process(n - 1, from, help, to);
    process(1, from, to, help);
    process(n - 1, help, to, from);
  }
}

2. å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å­åºåˆ—

public static List<String> subSequence(String str){
  List<String> res = new ArrayList<>();
  if(str == null){
    return res;
  }
  if(str.length() == 0){
    res.add("");
    return res;
  }
  
  char[] chars = str.toCharArray();
  process(res, chars, "", 0);
}

public static List<String> process(List<String> list, char[] chars, String path, int index){
  if(index == chars.length){
    list.add(path);
  }else{
    process(list, chars, path, index + 1);
    process(list, chars, path + String.valueOf(chars[index]), index + 1);
  }
}

3.å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å…¨æ’åˆ—

public static List<String> allArray(String str){
  List<String> res = new ArrayList<>();
  ArrayList<String> set = new ArrayList<>();
  char[] chars = str.toCharArray();
  for(char c : chars){
    set.add(c);
  }
  process(set, "", res);
  return res;
}

public static void process(ArrayList<String> set, String path, List<String> list){
  if(set.isEmpty()){
    list.add(path);
  }
  HashSet<Character> picked = new HashSet<>();
  for(int i = 0; i < set.size(); i++){
    if(!picked.contains(set.get(i))){
      picked.add(set.get(i));
      String newPath = path + set.get(i);
      ArrayList<String> next = new ArrayList<>(set);
      next.remove(i);
      process(next, newPath, list);
    }
  }
}

4.èƒŒåŒ…é—®é¢˜

public static int backpack(int[] weights, int[] values, int index, int weighted, int bagLimit){
  if(weighted > bagLimit){
    return 0;
  }
  if(index > weights.length){
    return 0;
  }
  Math.max(
    backpack(weights, values, index + 1, weighted, bagLimit),
  	backpack(weights, values, index + 1, weighted + weights[index], bagLimit) + values[index]
  );
}

5.çº¸ç‰Œé—®é¢˜

public static int maxWinSorce(int[] arr){
  if(arr == null){
    return 0;
  }
  return Math.max(
    firstHand(arr, 0, arr.length - 1),)
    secondHand(arr, 0, arr.length - 1);
}

public static int firstHand(int[] arr, int left, int right){
  if(left == right){
    return arr[left];
  }
  Math.max(
    arr[left] + secondHand(arr, left + 1, right),
  	arr[right] + secondHand(arr, left, right -1)
  );
}

public static int secondHand(int[] arr, int left, int right){
  if(left == right){
    return 0;
  }
  Math.min(
    firstHand(arr, left + 1, right),
  	firstHand(arr, left, right -1)
  );
}

6.Nçš‡å

public static int NQueen(int n){
  if(n < 1){
    return 0;
  }
  return process(0, new int[n], n);
}

public static int process(int index, int[] record, int n){
  if(index == n){
    return 1;
  }
  int res = 0;
  for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){
    if(valid(record, index, j)){
      record[index] = j;
      res += process(index + 1, record, n);
    }
  }
  return res;
}

public static boolean valid(int[] record, int index, int j){
  for(int k = 0; k < index; k++){
    if(record[k] == j || Math.abs(record[k] - j) == Math.abs(i - k)){return false;}
  }
  return true;
}

entry.title: å›¾çš„ç»å…¸ç®—æ³•
entry.content:
1. æ¨¡ç‰ˆ

public class Graph{
  public HashMap<Integer, Node> nodes;
  public HashSet<Edge> edges;
  public Graph(){
    nodes = new HashMap<>();
    edges = new HashSet<>();
  }
}

public class Node{
  public int value;
  public int in;
  public int out;
  public ArrayList<Node> nexts;
  public ArrayList<Edge> edges;
  public Node(int data){
    this.value = data;
    in = 0;
    out = 0;
    nexts = new ArrayList<>();
    edges = new ArrayList<>();
  }
}

public class Edge{
  public int weight;
  public Node from;
  public Node to;
  public Edge(int weight, Node from, Node to){
    this.weight = weight;
    this.from = from;
    this.to = to;
  }
}

2. å›¾çš„éå†

2.1 å®½åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†

public static void BFS(Node node){
  if(node == null){
    return;
  }
  LinkedList<Node> queue = new LinkedList<>();
  HashSet<Node> set = new HashSet<>();
  queue.add(node);
  set.add(node);
  while(!queue.isEmpty()){
    Node cur = queue.poll();
    //å…·ä½“éå†æ“ä½œ
    for(Node n : cur.nexts){
      if(!set.contains(n)){
        queue.add(n);
        set.add(n);
      }
    }
  }
}

2.2 æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†

public static void DFS(Node node){
  if(node == null){
    return;
  }
  Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<>();
  HashSet<Node> set = new HashSet<>();
  stack.push(node);
  set.add(node);
  //å…·ä½“éå†æ“ä½œ
  while(!stack.isEmpty()){
    Node cur = stack.pop();
    for(Node n : cur.nexts){
      if(!set.contains(n)){
        stack.push(cur);
        stack.push(n);
        set.add(n);
        //å…·ä½“éå†æ“ä½œ
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

3.æ‹“æ‰‘æ’åº

public static List<Node> topologySort(Graph graph){
  HashMap<Node, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
  LinkedList<Node> queue = new LinkedList<>();
  ArrayList<Node> list = new ArrayList<>();
  
  for(Node n : graph.nodes.values()){
    map.put(n, n.in);
    if(n.in == 0){
      queue.add(n);
    }
  }
  
  while(!queue.isEmpty()){
    Node cur = queue.pop();
    list.add(cur);
    for(Node n : cur.nexts){
      map.put(n, map.get(n) - 1);
      if(map.get(n) == 0){
        queue.add(n);
      }
    }
  }
  return list;
}

4. Primç®—æ³•

public static class EdgeComparator implements Comparator<Edge>{
  public int compare(Edge o1, Edge o2){
    //è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¯”è¾ƒå™¨:
    // o1 - o2 < 0 : o1 --> o2
    // o2 - o1 < 0 : o2 --> o1       
    return o1.weight - o2.weight;
  }
}

public static Set<Edge> prim(Graph graph){
  PriorityQueue<Edge> queue = new PriorityQueue<>();
  HashSet<Node> set = new HashSet<Node>();
  HashSet<Edge> res = new HashSet<Edge>();
  
  for(Node node : graph.nodes.values()){
    if(!set.contains(node)){
      set.add(node);
      for(Edge edge : node.edges){
        queue.add(edge);
      }
      while(!queue.isEmpty()){
        Edge edge = queue.poll();
        if(!set.contains(edge.to)){
          res.add(edge);
          set.add(edge.to);
          for(Edge e : edge.to.edges){
            queue.add(e);
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
  return res;
}

5. Dijkstraç®—æ³•

public static HashMap<Node, Integer> dijkstra(Node head){
  
  //distanceMap: å­˜å‚¨å‡ºå‘ç‚¹è‡³å…¶ä»–å„ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»
  HashMap<Node, Integer> distanceMap = new HashMap<>();
  //lockedSet: ç”¨äºè®°å½•å·²é”å®šçš„ç‚¹
  HashSet<Node> lockedSet = new HashSet<>();
  distanceMap.put(head, 0);
  //unlockedMinNode: æ‰¾å‡ºdistanceMapä¸­è·ç¦»æœ€å°ä¸”æœªé”å®šçš„ç‚¹
  Node minNode = unlockedMinNode(distanceMap, lockedSet);
  
  while(minNode != null){
    int dis = distanceMap.get(minNode);
    for(Edge edge : minNode.edges){
      if(!distanceMap.containsKey(edge.to)){
        distanceMap.put(edge.to, dis + edge.weight);
      }
      //è‹¥distanceMapä¸­å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™æ¯”è¾ƒåŸè·ç¦»å’Œæ–°å‘ç°çš„è¾¹æ‰€æ›´æ–°çš„è·ç¦»
      distanceMap.put(edge.to, 
                      Math.min(distanceMap.get(edge.to), 
                      				 dis + edge.weight));
    }
    lockedSet.add(minNode);
    minNode = unlockedMinNode(distanceMap, lockedSet);
  }
  return distanceMap;
}

public static Node unlockedMinNode(
  HashMap<Node, Integer> disMap, HashSet<Node> lockedSet){
  Node minNode = null;
  int minDis = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
  for(Map.Entry<Node, Integer> entry : disMap.entrySet()){
    Node n = entry.getKey();
    int dis = entry.getValue();
    if(!lockedSet.contains(n) && dis < minDis){
      minNode = n;
      minDis = dis;
    }
  }
  return minNode;
}

entry.title: é“¾è¡¨çš„å¸¸è§ç®—æ³•
entry.content:
1.åè½¬é“¾è¡¨

//å•å‘é“¾è¡¨çš„åè½¬
public static class Node{
  int value;
  Node next;
  public Node(int data){
    this.value = data;
  }
}

public static Node reverse(Node head){
  Node pre = null;
  Node next = null;
  while(head != null){
    next = head.next;
    head.next = pre;
    pre = head;
    head = next;
  }
  return pre;
}

//åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨çš„åè½¬
public static class DoubleNode{
  int value;
  DoubleNode next;
  DoubleNode last;
  public Double(int data){
    this.value = data;
  }
}

public static Node reverse(DoubleNode head){
  DoubleNode pre = null;
  DoubleNode next = null;
  while(head != null){
    next = head.next;
    head.next = pre;
    head.last = next;
    pre = head;
    head = next;
  }
  return pre;
}

2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå›æ–‡ç»“æ„

public static boolean palindrome1(Node head){
  Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<Node>();
  Node cur = head;
  while(cur != null){
    stack.push(cur);
    cur = cur.next;
  }
  while(!stack.isEmpty()){
    Node n = stack.pop();
    if(head.value != n.value){
      return false;
    }
    head = head.next;
  }
  return true;
}

public static boolean palindrome2(Node head){
  Node slow = head.next;
  Node fast = head;
  while(slow.next != null && fast.next.next != null){
    slow = slow.next;
    fast = fast.next.next;
  }
  Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<Node>();
  while(slow != null){
    stack.push(slow);
    slow = slow.next;
  }
  while(!stack.isEmpty()){
    Node n = stack.pop();
    if(n.value != head.value){
      return false;
    }
    head = head.next;
  }
  return true;
}

public static boolean palindrome3(Node head){
  Node slow = head;
  Node fast = head;
  while(slow.next != null && fast.next.next != null){
    slow = slow.next;
    fast = fast.next.next;
  }
  
  //æ­¤æ—¶slowåœåœ¨ä¸­ç‚¹ï¼Œå¤ç”¨fastæŒ‡é’ˆåè½¬é“¾è¡¨
  fast = slow.next;
  slow.next = null;
  Node next = null;
  while(fast != null){
    next = fast.next;
    fast.next = slow;
    slow = fast;
    fast = next;
  }
  
  //åè½¬å®Œæˆï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶slowåœ¨å°¾éƒ¨,fastä¸ºnullï¼Œå¼€å§‹åˆ¤æ–­
  Node end = slow; //è®°å½•å°¾éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¤åŸä½¿ç”¨
  boolean res = true;
  while(head != null && slow != null){
    if(head.value != slow.value){
      res = false;
    }
    head = head.next;
    slow = slow.next;
  }
  
  //å¤åŸé“¾è¡¨,å¤ç”¨fastæŒ‡é’ˆ
  fast = end.next;
  end.next = null;
  while(fast != null){
    next = fast.next;
    fast.next = end;
    end = fast;
    fast = next;
  }
  return res;
}

3. é“¾è¡¨çš„è·å…°å›½æ——é—®é¢˜

public static Node flag(Node head, int pivot){
  
  Node sHead = null;
  Node sTail = null;
  
  Node eHead = null;
  Node eTail = null;
  
  Node bHead = null;
  Node bTail = null;
  
  while(head != null){
    if(head.value < pivot){
      if(sHead == null){
        sHead = head;
        sTail = head;
      }else{
        sTail.next = head;
        sTail = head;
      }
    }else if(head.value > pivot){
      if(bHead == null){
        bHead = head;
        bTail = head;
      }else{
        bTail.next = head;
        bTail = head;
      }
    }else{
      if(eHead == null){
        eHead = head;
        eTail = head;
      }else{
        eTail.next = head;
        eTail = head;
      }
    }
    head = head.next;
  }
  
  if(sTail != null){
    sTail.next = eHead;
    eTail = eTail == null ? sTail : eTail;
  }
  
  if(eTail != null){
    eTail.next = bHead;
  }
  
  return sHead != null ? 
    		 sHead : eHead != null ? eHead : bHead; 
}

4.å¸¦éšæœºæŒ‡é’ˆçš„é“¾è¡¨å¤åˆ¶

public static Node copy1(Node head){
  HashMap<Node, Node> map = new HashMap<>();
  Node cur = head;
  while(cur != null){
    map.put(cur, new Node(cur.value));
    cur = cur.next;
  }
  cur = head;
  while(cur != null){
    map.get(cur).next = map.get(cur.next);
    map.get(cur).random = map.get(cur.random);
    cur = cur.next;
  }
  return map.get(head);
}

public static Node copy2(Node head){
  
  //å…ˆæŒ‰ç…§nextæŒ‡é’ˆåœ¨åŸé“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹åé¢å¤åˆ¶å¯¹åº”èŠ‚ç‚¹
  Node cur = head;
  Node next = null;
  while(cur != null){
    next = cur.next;
    cur.next = new Node(cur.value);
    cur.next.next = next;
    cur = next;
  }
  
  //å¤åˆ¶åŸé“¾è¡¨çš„randomæŒ‡é’ˆ
  cur = head;
  Node copy = null;
  while(cur != null){
    next = cur.next.next;
    copy = cur.next;
    copy.random = cur.random != ? cur.random.next : null;
    cur = next;
  }
  
  //å°†åŸé“¾è¡¨ä¸å¤åˆ¶å¥½çš„é“¾è¡¨åˆ†ç¦»
  Node res = head.next;
  cur = head;
  while(cur != null){
    next = cur.next.next;
    copy = cur.next;
    cur.next = next;
    copy.next = next != null ? next.next : null;
    cur = next;
  }
  return res;
}

5.é“¾è¡¨ç›¸äº¤ç›¸å…³é—®é¢˜

åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œè‹¥ç›¸äº¤è¿”å›ç›¸äº¤èŠ‚ç‚¹

public static Node intersection(Node head1, Node head2){
  if(head1 == null || head2 == null){
    return null;
  }
  Node loop1 = getLoop(head1);
  Node loop2 = getLoop(head2);
  //1.è‹¥ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨éƒ½æ— ç¯
  if(loop1 == null && loop2 == null){
    return noLoop(head1, head2);
  }
  //2.è‹¥ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰ç¯ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ— ç¯ï¼Œå¿…å®šä¸ç›¸äº¤
  //3.è‹¥ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨éƒ½æœ‰ç¯
  if(loop1 != null && loop2 != null){
    return bothLoop(head1, loop1, head2, loop2);
  }
  return null;
}

//åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ç¯å¹¶è¿”å›å…¥ç¯èŠ‚ç‚¹
public static Node getLoop(Node head){
  if(head == null || head.next == null 
     || head.next.next == null){
    return null;
  }
  Node slow = head.next;
  Node fast = head.next.next;
  while(slow != fast){
    slow = slow.next;
    fast = fast.next.next;
  }
  fast = head;
  while(slow != fast){
    slow = slow.next;
    fast = fast.next;
  }
  return fast;
}

//éƒ½æ— ç¯
public static Node noLoop(Node head1, Node head2){
  Node cur1 = head1;
  Node cur2 = head2;
  int length = 0;
  //åˆ†åˆ«æ‰¾å‡ºä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨çš„å°¾éƒ¨,lengthç”¨äºæ±‚é•¿åº¦çš„å·®å€¼
  while(cur1.next != null){
    length++;
    cur1 = cur1.next;
  }
  while(cur2.next != null){
    length--;
    cur2 = cur2.next;
  }
  //åªæœ‰å°¾èŠ‚ç‚¹ç›¸åŒæ‰ä¼šç›¸äº¤
  if(cur1 == cur2){
    cur1 = length > 0 ? head1 : head2; //cur1æŒ‡å‘æ›´é•¿é“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´éƒ¨
    cur2 = cur1 == head1 ? head2 : head1;
    length = Math.abs(length);
    while(length != 0){
      length--;
      cur1 = cur1.next;
    }
    while(cur1 != cur2){
      cur1 = cur1.next;
      cur2 = cur2.next;
    }
    return cur1;
  }else{
    return null;
  }
}

//éƒ½æœ‰ç¯
public static Node bothLoop(
  Node head1, Node loop1, Node head2, Node loop2){
  Node cur1 = null;
  Node cur2 = null;
  //è‹¥å…¥ç¯èŠ‚ç‚¹ç›¸åŒï¼Œåˆ™ç±»ä¼¼äºæ— ç¯ç›¸äº¤çš„æƒ…å†µ
  if(loop1 == loop2){
    cur1 = head1;
    cur2 = head2;
    int length = 0;
    while(cur1 != loop1){
      length++;
      cur1 = cur1.next;
    }
    while(cur2 != loop2){
      length--;
      cur2 = cur.next;
    }
    cur1 = length > 0 ? head1 : head2;
    cur2 = cur1 == head1 ? head2 : head1;
    length = Math.abs(length);
    while(length != 0){
      length--;
      cur1 = cur1.next;
    }
    while(cur1 != cur2){
      cur1 = cur1.next;
      cur2 = cur2.next;
    }
    return cur1;
  }else{
    cur1 = loop1.next;
    while(cur1 != loop1){
      if(cur1 == loop2){
        return loop1;
      }
      cur1 = cur1.next;
    }
    return null;
  }
}

entry.title: æ’åºç®—æ³•
entry.content:
1.å†’æ³¡æ’åº

public static void bubbleSort(int[] arr){
  if(arr.length < 2 || arr == null){
    return;
  }
  //å¤§æ•°å†’æ³¡
  for(int i = arr.length - 1; i > 0; i--){
    for(int j = 0; j < i; j++){
      if(arr[j] > arr[j + 1]){
        swap(arr, j, j + 1);
      }
    }
  }
  
  //å°æ•°å†’æ³¡
  for(int i = 0; i < arr.length - 1; i++){
    for(int j = length - 1; j > i; j--){
      if(arr[j] < arr[j - 1]){
        swap(arr, j, j - 1);
      }
    }
  }
}

public static void swap(int[] arr, int a, int b){
  int temp = arr[a];
  arr[a] = arr[b];
  arr[b] = temp;
}

2.æ’å…¥æ’åº

public static void insertSort(int[] arr){
  if(arr == null || arr.length < 2){
    return;
  }
  for(int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++){
    for(int j = i - 1; j >= 0 && arr[j] > arr[j + 1]; j--){
      swap(arr, j, j + 1);
    }
  }
}

3. é€‰æ‹©æ’åº

public static void selectSort(int[] arr){
  if(arr == null || arr.length < 2){
    return;
  }
  for(int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++){
    int minIndex = i;
    for(int j = i + 1; j < arr.length; j++){
      minIndex = arr[j] < arr[minIndex] ? j : minIndex;
    }
    swap(arr, minIndex, i);
  }
  
}

4. å½’å¹¶æ’åº

public static void mergeSort(int[] arr){
   if(arr == null || arr.length < 2){
    return;
  }
  process(arr, 0, arr.length - 1);
}

public static void process(int[] arr, int left, int right){
  if(left == right){
    return;
  }
  int mid = (left + right) / 2;
  process(arr, left, mid);
  process(arr, mid + 1, right);
  merge(arr, left, mid, right);
}

public static void merge(int[] arr, int left, int mid, int right){
  int[] help = new int[right - left + 1];
  int p1 = left;
  int p2 = mid + 1;
  int i = 0;
  while(p1 <= mid && p2 <= right){
    help[i++] = arr[p1] < arr[p2] ? arr[p1++] : arr[p2++];
  }
  while(p1 <= mid){
    help[i++] = arr[p1++];
  }
  while(p2 <= right){
    help[i++] = arr[p2++];
  }
  for(int j = 0; j < help.length; j++){
    arr[left + j] = help[j];
  }
}

5. éšæœºå¿«æ’

public static void quickSort(int[] arr){
  if(arr == null || arr.length < 2){
    return;
  }
  process(arr, 0, arr.length - 1);
}

public static void process(int[] arr, int left, int right){
  if(left < right){
    swap(arr, right, 
         left + (int)(Math.random() * (right - left + 1)));
    int[] p = partition(arr, left, right);
    process(arr, left, p[0] - 1);
    process(arr, p[1] + 1, right);
  }
}

public static int[] partition(int[] arr, int left, int right){
  int lessZone = left - 1;
  int moreZone = right;
  while(left < moreZone){
    if(arr[left] > arr[right]){
      swap(arr, left, --moreZone);
    }if(arr[left] < arr[right]){
      swap(arr, left++, ++lessZone);
    }else{
      left++;
    }
  }
  swap(arr, right, moreZone);
  return new int[] {lessZone + 1, moreZone};
}

6. å †æ’åº

ç”¨æ•°ç»„çš„æ–¹å¼è¡¨ç¤ºå®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œå¯¹äºä»»æ„èŠ‚ç‚¹iï¼š

å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹: 2i + 1, å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹: 2i + 2, çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹: ï¼ˆi - 1ï¼‰/ 2

public static void heapSort(int[] arr){
  if(arr == null || arr.length < 2){
    return;
  }
  for(int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++){
    heapInsert(arr, i);
  }
  int size = arr.length;
  swap(arr, 0, --size);
  while(size > 0){
    heapify(arr, 0, size);
    swap(arr, 0, --size);
  }
}

public static void heapInsert(int[] arr, int index){
  while(arr[index] > arr[(index - 1) / 2]){
    swap(arr, index, (index - 1) / 2);
    index = (index - 1) / 2;
  }
}

public static void heapify(int[] arr, int index, int size){
  int left = 2 * index + 1;
  while(left < size){
    int max = left + 1 < size && arr[left + 1] > arr[left] 
      ? left + 1 : left;
    max = arr[max] > arr[index] ? max : index;
    if(max == index){
      break;
    }
    swap(arr, index, max);
    index = max;
    left = 2 * index + 1;
  }
}

7. æ¡¶æ’åº

åŸºæ•°æ’åº

è®¡æ•°æ’åº

8. æ€»ç»“

æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ æ˜¯å¦ç¨³å®š
é€‰æ‹©æ’åº O(N^2) O(1) å¦
å†’æ³¡æ’åº O(N^2) O(1) æ˜¯
æ’å…¥æ’åº O(N^2) O(1) æ˜¯
å½’å¹¶æ’åº O(N*logN) O(N) æ˜¯
éšæœºå¿«æ’ O(N*logN) O(logN) å¦
å †æ’åº O(N*logN) O(1) å¦
æ¡¶æ’åº O(N) O(M) æ˜¯

entry.title: äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å¸¸è§ç®—æ³•
entry.content:
1.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘

åˆ¤æ–­æ ‡å‡†ï¼šå®½åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†æ—¶ 1ï¼‰è‹¥æŸèŠ‚ç‚¹æœ‰å³èŠ‚ç‚¹æ— å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ä¸ºå®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘ 2ï¼‰æŸèŠ‚ç‚¹å·¦å³èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å…¨ï¼Œåç»­éƒ½å¿…é¡»ä¸ºå¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸æ˜¯å®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘(ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå¸ƒå°”å€¼è®°å½•çŠ¶æ€)

public static boolean heapTree(Node head){
  if(head == null){
    return true;
  }
  LinkedList<Node>() queue = new LinkedList<>();
  queue.add(head);
  boolean leaf = false;
  Node right = null;
  Node left = null;
  while(!queue.isEmpty()){
    head = queue.poll();
    right = head.right;
    left = head.left;
    if( (right != null && left == null) //æ¡ä»¶1
       || (leaf && (right != null || left != null))){ //æ¡ä»¶2
      return false;
    }
    if(right != null){
      queue.add(right);
    }
    if(left != null){
      queue.add(left);
    }
    if(right == null || left == null){
      leaf = true; //å·¦å³å­æ ‘æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¼€å¯å¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è®°å½•çŠ¶æ€
    }
  }
  return true;
}

2.æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æœ€ä½å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆèŠ‚ç‚¹

è®¾ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºn1,n2ï¼Œ é€’å½’å‡½æ•°ä¸­ï¼š

  1. è‹¥å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºn1æˆ–n2,è¿”å›è‡ªå·±ï¼ˆä¸ºç©ºåˆ™è¿”å›ç©º ï¼‰
  2. é€’å½’é»‘ç›’æ±‚å‡ºå·¦å³å­æ ‘çš„è¿”å›å€¼
  3. è‹¥å·¦å³å­æ ‘è¿”å›å€¼éƒ½ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿”å›è‡ªå·±ï¼ˆå·²æ‰¾åˆ°å…¬å…±ç¥–å…ˆï¼‰
  4. å·¦å³å­æ ‘ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ºç©ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸ä¸ºç©ºçš„ä¸€é¡¹
public static Node process(Node head, Node n1, Node n2){
  if(head == null || head == n1 || head == n2){
    return head;
  }
  Node left = process(head.left, n1, n2);
  Node right = process(head.right, n1, n2);
  if(left != null && right != null){
    return head;
  }
  return left == null ? right : left;
}

3.æŸ¥æ‰¾æŸèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åç»§èŠ‚ç‚¹

åç»§èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼šæŸèŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨ä¸­åºéå†ä¸­çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹

public static Node find(Node node){
  if(node == null){
    return node;
  }
  if(node.right != null){ //æœ‰å³æ ‘
    return process(node.right); //åˆ™ä¸­ç»§ä¸ºå³æ ‘ä¸Šæœ€å·¦çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
  }else{ 	//	æ— å³æ ‘
    Node parent = node.parent;
    //è‹¥node = parent.left, åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›parent
    //å¦åˆ™ç»§ç»­å‘ä¸Šå¯»æ‰¾ï¼Œç›´åˆ°node = parent.node
    //æœ€åï¼Œè‹¥ä¸€ç›´æœªæ‰¾åˆ°åˆ™è¿”å›null(æœ€å³èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¸­ç»§ä¸ºnull)
    while(parent != null && node != parent.left){
      node = parent;
      parent = node.parent;
    }
    return parent;
  }
} 

public static Node process(Node node){
  if(node == null){
    return node;
  }
  while(node.left != null){
    node = node.left;
  }
  return node;
}

4.åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ååºåˆ—åŒ–

// '#'è¡¨ç¤ºnull, '_'ç”¨äºåˆ†éš”
public static String serial(Node node){
  if(node == null){
    return '#_';
  }
  String res = node.data + '_';
  //æŒ‰ç…§å…ˆåºéå†çš„é¡ºåºå°†æ ‘åºåˆ—åŒ–æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  res += serial(node.left);
  res += serial(node.right);
  return res;
}

public static Node recon(String str){
  String[] arr = str.split('_');
  Queue<String> queue = new LinkedList<String>();
  for(int i = 0; i != arr.length; i++){
    queue.offer(arr[i]);
  }
  return reconProcess(queue);
}

public static Node reconProcess(Queue<String> queue){
  String str = queue.poll();
  if(str.equals('#')){
    return null;
  }
  Node head = new Node(Integer.valueOf(str));
  head.left = reconProcess(queue);
  head.right = reconProcess(queue);
  return head;
}

entry.title: äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„é€’å½’æ¡†æ¶
entry.content:
1.åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€æ£µæ ‘æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ»¡äºŒå‰æ ‘

æ»¡äºŒå‰æ ‘æ¡ä»¶ï¼šæ€»èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•° = 2 ^ é«˜åº¦ - 1

  1. å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¿¡æ¯ç±»ï¼Œç”¨äºè·å–éœ€è¦çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ­¤å¤„ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°å’Œé«˜åº¦ï¼‰
  2. é€’å½’å‡½æ•°ä¸­å…ˆä½¿ç”¨é»‘ç›’ï¼Œå†è¡¥å……é»‘ç›’ä¸­è·å–ä¿¡æ¯çš„æ“ä½œï¼ˆæ­¤å¤„ä¸ºå‡å®šé€šè¿‡é»‘ç›’å·²è·å–åˆ°äº†å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å³å­æ ‘çš„é«˜åº¦å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨è¯¥ä¿¡æ¯å¾—å‡ºå½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤„çš„é«˜åº¦å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•°ï¼‰
  3. åœ¨ä¸»å‡½æ•°ä¸­åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶
//å®šä¹‰ä¿¡æ¯ç±»
public static class Info{
  public int size;
  public int height;
  public Info(int s, int h){
    this.size = s;
    this.height = h;
  }
}
//é€’å½’å‡½æ•°
public static Info process(Node head){
  if(head == null){
    return new Info(0, 0);
  }
  Info leftInfo = process(head.left);
  Info rightInfo = process(head.right);
  int size = leftInfo.size + rightInfo.size + 1;
  int height = Math.max(leftInfo.height, rightInfo.height)+1;
  return new Info(size, height);
} 
//ä¸»å‡½æ•°
public static boolean isFullTree(Node head){
  Info info = process(head);
  return info.size == (1 << height) - 1; // å·¦ç§»1ä½=2^height
}

2.åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€æ£µæ ‘æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘

å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘æ¡ä»¶ï¼šå·¦å³å­æ ‘é«˜åº¦å·®ä¸è¶…è¿‡1ä¸”æ‰€æœ‰å­æ ‘éƒ½å¹³è¡¡
ä¿¡æ¯ç±»ï¼šé«˜åº¦ï¼Œå­æ ‘æ˜¯å¦å¹³è¡¡

public static class Info{
  public int height;
  public boolean balance;
  public Info(int h, boolean b){
    this.height = h;
    this.balance = b;
  }
}
public static Info process(Node head){
  if(head == null){
    return new Info(0, true);
  }
  Info leftInfo = process(head.left);
  Info rightInfo = process(head.right);
  int height = Math.max(leftInfo.height, rightInfo.height) +1;
  boolean balance = 
    leftInfo.balance && rightInfo.balance 
    && Math.abs(leftInfo.height - rightInfo.height) < 2;
  return new Info(height, balance);
}

3.æ±‚äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸¤èŠ‚ç‚¹é—´çš„æœ€å¤§è·ç¦»

ä¿¡æ¯ç±»ï¼šé«˜åº¦ï¼Œæœ€å¤§è·ç¦»
æœ€å¤§è·ç¦»å‡ºç°çš„ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µï¼šå·¦æ ‘ä¸Šï¼Œå³æ ‘ä¸Šï¼Œæ¨ªè·¨å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹

public static class Info{
  public int height;
  public int distance;
  public Info(int h, int d){
    this.height = h;
    this.distance = d;
  }
}
public static Info process(Node head){
  if(head = null){
    return new Info(0, 0);
  }
  Info leftInfo = process(head.left);
  Info rightInfo = process(head.right);
  int height = Math.max(leftInfo.height, rightInfo.height) +1;
  int distance = Math.max(leftInfo.height+rightInfo.height+1,
             Math.max(leftInfo.distance, rightInfo.distance));
  return new Info(height, distance);
}

4.åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€æ£µæ ‘æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæœç´¢äºŒå‰æ ‘

æœç´¢äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼š1ï¼‰å·¦æ ‘æ˜¯æœç´¢äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œ 2ï¼‰å³æ ‘æ˜¯æœç´¢äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œ3ï¼‰å·¦æ ‘çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼å°äºå¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œ 4ï¼‰å³æ ‘çš„æœ€å°å€¼å¤§äºå¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
ä¿¡æ¯ç±»ï¼šæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæœç´¢äºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œæœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œæœ€å°å€¼

public static class Info{
  public boolean searchTree;
  public int max;
  public int min;
  public Info(boolean s, int max, int min){
    this.searchTree = s;
    this.max = max;
    this.min = min;
  }
}
public static Info process(Node head){
  if(head == null){
    return null;
  }
  
  Info leftInfo = process(head.left);
  Info rightInfo = process(head.right);
  
  int max = head.data;
  int min = head.data;
  
  if(leftInfo != null){
    max = Math.max(max, leftInfo.max);
    min = Math.min(min, leftInfo.min);
  }
  if(rightInfo != null){
    max = Math.max(max, rightInfo.max);
    min = Math.min(min, rightInfo.min);
  }
  
  boolean searchTree = false;
  //ä¸‰ç›®çš„æ„ä¹‰ï¼šè‹¥å·¦æ ‘ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼ŒæŒ‰1ï¼‰å·¦æ ‘æ˜¯æœç´¢æ ‘ 2ï¼‰å·¦æ ‘æœ€å¤§å€¼å°äºèŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼›è‹¥å·¦æ ‘ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥ä¸ºtrueä¸ç”¨åˆ¤æ–­ã€‚å³æ ‘åŒç†ã€‚
  if(
    (leftInfo != null ? 
    (leftInfo.searchTree && leftInfo.max < head.data) : true)
    &&
    (rightInfo != null ?
    (rightInfo.searchTree && rightInfo.min > head.data): true)
  ){
    searchTree = true;
  }
  return new Info(searchTree, max, min);
}

ä¸­åºéå†æ–¹æ³•

public static boolean searchTree(Node head){
  if(head == null){
    return true;
  }
  Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<>();
  Node cur = head;
  int pre = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
  while(!stack.isEmpty() || cur != null){
    if(cur != null){
      stack.push(cur);
      cur = cur.left;
    }else{
      cur = stack.pop();
      if(cur.data <= pre){
        return false;
      }
      pre = cur.data;
      cur = cur.right;
    }
  }
  return true;
}

entry.title: äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„éå†
entry.content:
1. é€’å½’éå†

public static class Node{
  public int value;
  public Node left;
  public Node right;
  
  public Node(int data){
    this.value = data;
  }
}

public static void f(Node head){
  if(head == null){
    return;
  }
  //å…ˆåºéå†æ“ä½œ
  f(head.left);
  //ä¸­åºéå†æ“ä½œ
  f(head.right);
  //ååºéå†æ“ä½œ
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘é€’å½’éå†çš„æœ¬è´¨ï¼šé€šè¿‡æ ‘çš„å®Œæ•´é€’å½’åºåŠ å·¥è€Œæˆ
å®Œæ•´é€’å½’åºï¼š1 -> 2 -> 2 -> 2 -> 1 -> 3 -> 3 -> 3 -> 1
å…ˆåºï¼šç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æ¥åˆ°èŠ‚ç‚¹æ—¶è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ 1 -> 2 -> 3
ä¸­åºï¼šç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡æ¥åˆ°èŠ‚ç‚¹æ—¶è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ 2 -> 1 -> 3
ååºï¼šç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡æ¥åˆ°èŠ‚ç‚¹æ—¶è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ 2 -> 3 -> 1

2. éé€’å½’éå†

2.1 å…ˆåºéå†

éå†é¡ºåºï¼šä¸­ --> å·¦ --> å³ï¼Œ1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 5 -> 3 -> 6 -> 7

  1. å»ºç«‹æ ˆç»“æ„ï¼Œå‹å…¥å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
  2. ä»æ ˆä¸­å¼¹å‡ºå½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ“ä½œ
  3. å…ˆå‹å…¥å¼¹å‡ºèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå†å‹å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œé‡å¤æ­¥éª¤2ç›´åˆ°æ ˆä¸ºç©º
public static void preUnRecur(Node head){
  if(head != null){
    Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<>();
    stack.add(head);
    while(!stack.isEmpty()){
      head = stack.pop();
      //è¯¥å¤„æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ“ä½œ
      if(head.right != null){
        stack.push(head.right);
      }
      if(head.left != null){
        stack.push(head.left);
      }
    }
  }
}

2.2 ä¸­åºéå†

éå†é¡ºåºï¼šå·¦ --> ä¸­ --> å³ï¼Œ4 -> 2 -> 5 -> 1 -> 6 -> 3 -> 7

  1. å»ºç«‹æ ˆç»“æ„ï¼Œå‹å…¥å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
  2. ä¸æ–­å°†å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å‹æ ˆï¼Œç›´åˆ°æŸèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ä»æ ˆä¸­å¼¹å‡ºè¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹å¹¶æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ“ä½œ
  3. è‹¥å¼¹å‡ºèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œé‡å¤æ­¥éª¤2ï¼›è‹¥ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™ç»§ç»­ä»æ ˆä¸­å¼¹å‡ºä¸‹ä¸€èŠ‚ç‚¹ç›´åˆ°æ ˆä¸ºç©º
public void inUnRecur(Node head){
  if(head != null){
    Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<>();
    Node cur = head;
    while(!stack.isEmpty() || cur != null){
      if(cur != null){
        stack.push(cur);
        cur = cur.left;
      }else{
        cur = stack.pop();
        //æ­¤å¤„æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ“ä½œ
        cur = cur.right;
      }
    }
  }
}

2.3 ååºéå†

éå†é¡ºåºï¼šå·¦ --> å³ --> ä¸­ï¼Œ4 -> 5 -> 2 -> 6 -> 7 -> 3 -> 1
ç±»ä¼¼äºå…ˆåºéå†ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§å…ˆå·¦åå³çš„é¡ºåºå‹æ ˆã€‚é¢å¤–å‡†å¤‡ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆï¼Œå°†å¼¹å‡ºèŠ‚ç‚¹å‹å…¥ï¼Œç›´åˆ°1å·æ ˆä¸ºç©ºæ—¶ï¼Œå°†èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¾æ¬¡ä»2å·æ ˆå¼¹å‡ºå¹¶æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ“ä½œã€‚

public static void postUnRecur(Node head){
  if(head != null){
    Stack<Node> s1 = new Stack<>();
    Stack<Node> s2 = new Stack<>();
    s1.push(head);
    while(!s1.isEmpty()){
      head = s1.pop();
      s2.push(head);
      if(head.left != null){
        s1.push(head.left);
      }
      if(head.right != null){
        s1.push(head.right);
      }
    }
    while(!s2.isEmpty()){
      head = s2.pop();
      //æ­¤å¤„æ‰§è¡Œéå†æ“ä½œ
    }
  }
}

3.å®½åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†

  1. ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ‰€åœ¨å±‚æ•°ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é˜Ÿåˆ—è¿›è¡Œå®½åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†
  2. æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½è¿›å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå…¶å·¦å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å±‚æ•°+1è¿›å…¥å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨
  3. ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—å¼¹å‡ºæ—¶ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒè¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æ‰€åœ¨å±‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦å¤§äºå½“å‰å±‚æ•°ï¼Œè‹¥å¤§äºï¼ˆè¯´æ˜å·²åˆ°äº†ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™å°†å½“å‰å±‚å®½åº¦æ¸…é›¶å¹¶æ›´æ–°å½“å‰å±‚æ•°ï¼›è‹¥ä¸å¤§äºï¼ˆè¯´æ˜è¿˜åœ¨åŒä¸€å±‚ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™å½“å‰å±‚å®½åº¦+1ã€‚æ¯æ¬¡å¯¹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ“ä½œå®Œæˆåéƒ½æ¯”è¾ƒå¹¶æ›´æ–°æœ€å¤§å®½åº¦ä¸å½“å‰å±‚å®½åº¦çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚
public static int getMaxWidth(Node head){
  if(head ==null){
    return 0;
  }
  int maxWidth = 0;
  int curWidth = 0;
  int curLevel = 0;
  HashMap<Node, Integer> levelMap = new HashMap<>();
  LinkedList<Node> queue = new LinkedList<>();
  levelMap.put(head, 1);
  queue.add(head);
  Node cur = null;
  Node left = null;
  Node right = null;
  while(!queue.isEmpty()){
    cur = queue.poll();
    left = cur.left;
    right = cur.right;
    if(left != null){
      levelMap.put(left, levelMap.get(cur) + 1);
      queue.add(left);
    }
    if(right != null){
      levelMap.put(right, levelMap.get(cur) + 1);
      queue.add(right);
    }
    if(levelMap.get(cur) > curLevel){
      curWidth = 0;
      curLevel = levelMap.get(cur);
    }else{
      curWidth++;
    }
    maxWidth = Math.max(curWidth, maxWidth);
  }
  return maxWidth;
}

entry.title: Hello Gridea
